MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL22 postcode area of Abergele affecting properties in St George, Moelfre and Groesffordd Marli. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Restoration is taking longer than expected because of repairs required to a grounded overhead line and our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:00am on 24th March 2021.
